review:
I am extremely grateful to have had the opportunity to be under the care of Dr. Madhu Goel. Her exceptional expertise, compassion, and dedication have made a profound impact on my life.

I was suffering with endometriosis for a long time , which not only caused extreme pain and fertility issues but has also led me on a frustrating journey through consultations with numerous gynaecologists. Dr. Madhu Goel, however, stood out in a league of her own. From the very beginning, she took the time to truly listen to my concerns, delve into the root causes of my condition, and, most importantly, help me select the appropriate treatment.

What sets Dr. Goel apart is her holistic approach to healthcare. Not only did she address my physical health, but she also recognized the toll that endometriosis had taken on my mental well-being. During one of our consultations, what started as a routine gynaecological session transformed into a profound counselling session. Dr. Goel patiently spent nearly 40 minutes discussing the underlying causes of my condition and providing valuable insights into lifestyle changes that could significantly improve my overall health and well-being.

In my journey, having consulted with a total of nine gynaecologists, I had never encountered a doctor as kind, empathetic, and understanding as Dr. Madhu Goel. Her genuine care and concern for her patients are truly remarkable. Thanks to her guidance and support, I am now living a healthier, more fulfilling life.

Dr. Madhu Goel has been nothing short of a blessing in my life, and I am forever grateful to her -being. Her exceptional medical expertise combined with her compassion make her an outstanding doctor, and I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking top-notch care and support in their endometriosis and fertility journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Madhu Goel is the nicest and most patient friendly *** ****** ************* ************** I would recommend her to any one for.
I have been taking my wife to see her since March 2019 for the prenatal appointments, and have been happy with services rendered. We see Dr. Madhu, who has a great bedside manner, and has been great at making us comfortable and answering all of our questions. One service that is great is the "ask any question" function in the clinic, this makes asking questions without hesitation and hassle free. 

This is the second time we have been consulting her for our baby delivery, her support at the time of our first baby delivery was exceptional and that fetched us for the second time. 
She is so humbled, cool, polite having high level of patience. 
In short, just dont think even for a second, if you need to have any consultation related to women. 
She is the only doctor in Delhi who makes normal delivery mostly. She never does surgery till it is critical.
reply_text: Thanks for the nice words. Appreciate

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She delivered my baby boy in September 2020. I had been going to her since May 2020. She is the most friendly and accessible gynaecologist i have ever visited. She is very patient to solve your queries since I was a first time mom. She takes time to answer even your silly questions. I went to Dr Madhu during my pregnancy and even for my emergency C sec, she was the one. She is very responsive and  takes care of the patient on a personal level that you don't hesitate to discuss anything.

Thanks a lot Dr Madhu for everything

*** **** **** **** ************ ** *** **** *** ***** **** ** ****** *** ********** her practical thinking and her carring attitude everything was amazing she listens our problem passionately with smile by giving ample time to explain u she gives confidence & moral support to patients like a caring sister 
I met her in Friday evening after traveling 40  km from ghaziabad 
and she makes this visit fruitful she almost solved 6 year old problem in 1 visit 
feeling very blessed after meeting such a wonderful doctor 
thanks to Dr.madhu goel

*** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** **** **** ****** * We found her extremely technically sound , transparent and professional in her medical advice . She doesnâ€™t prescribe unnecessary medication and counsels you to follow healthy diet throughout the pregnancy. She is very prompt to respond to your concerns and is always reachable whether on phone or whatsapp . We had very positive and happy experience with her . We delivered twins recently with her and they came at 33 weeks . She is extremely conscious and handled my emergency delivery quite well . Even in operation theatre , she was telling paediatrician to take care of our babies and that the pregnancy is very precious to her .  The babies were in NICU for sometime and she was then also very concerned and used to take regular updates and kept visiting us . When we took babies to show her later , she showered her motherly love to them . In short , we trust her and strongly recommend her.
reply_text:
Hi Ankita...
Thank you for the great words. I am glad that I could make a difference in your lives...

review: This was my 2nd visit (the last time the matter was resolved to my satisfaction) and the doctor is helpful and professional. She listened to my problem though I felt that perhaps she could have been a bit more patient with the details I was providing since I felt that it was important to provide full information. In any case, she is an experienced doctor, prescribed medicines and asked me to return so that was encouraging. I do think the clinic should get a card machine since it's inconvenient to go to the ATM if one is running low on cash, which in this day and age, is common.
reply_text:
Thank you kamyani....sometimes there is a gap between patient expections and our responses..
I have always tried to bridge these gaps and that is why the feedback responses are important.
About the card machine ...will try to work on it. But we do have paytm facilities.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are recently blessed with a baby girl through normal delivery. We had a wonderful experience with Dr. Madhu Goel, she is very friendly and approachable. She has always been available at the time of need. I would like to thank her for all her support and guidance throughout my pregnancy. We chose Fortis La Femme for our delivery because of Dr. Madhu Goel and not the other way round. We can, without a second thought, recommend Dr. Madhu Goel to anyone looking for pregnancy checkup / delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She's very caring doc, advices only whatever is required and has empathy which is not found in most of the doc these days. Her advices we're perfect. Although we did not get our delivery done here as my wife went to her home town for that but I would rate her on full scale for the treatment and care given.
Thanks doctor.

Dr Madhu Goel is one of the experienced doctors in New Delhi.  Her extended care and dedicated time for the patients are truely commendable.  I am really very much pleased for the support and care she has provided to me for my pregnancy.  I would always recommend her name to any of my relatives and other patients.

review: Dr Madhu, we cannot thank her enough. She is everything you want your doctor to be. Our journey with her started 2 years ago.  From being a patient listener to being a good friend to being an excellent doctor -She is everything and much more. After suffering from miscarriages when finally we had a successful pregnancy midst the current pandemic, she made sure that the complete delivery process was seamless. Once again, thank you doctor for making our dreams come true!

review:
Gone for the check of PCOD treatment for my wife. Found she was pregnant instead.
Handled very carefully by Dr. Madhu. It was not a normal delivery with such complication facing upper hand. But the care and treatment was very satisfied. We do not have to take strict prior appointment as the doctor was available every time for us.
Regular meetings of the doctor with radiologist enable us to move swiftly towards the delivery of our baby.
Strictly recommended.
